Package model

Class BoardGame

java.lang.Object
model.Toy
model.BoardGame
public class BoardGame extends Toy
The BoardGame class represents a type of toy that is a board game. It extends the base class Toy and includes additional properties such as the number of players, minimum and maximum number of players, and author.

      Parameters:
      serialNumber - The serial number of the board game.
      name - The name of the board game.
      brand - The brand of the board game.
      price - The price of the board game.
      availableCount - The available count of the board game.
      ageAppropriate - The age appropriateness of the board game.
      numOfPlayers - The number of players the board game is designed for.
      author - The author of the board game.
